description: A string is considered beautiful if it satisfies the following conditions: For example, strings "aeiou" and "aaaaaaeiiiioou" are considered beautiful, but "uaeio", "aeoiu", and "aaaeeeooo" are not beautiful. Given a string word consisting of English vowels, return the length of the longest beautiful substring of word. If no such substring exists, return 0. A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters in a string.
